  • Classes in com.okta.authn.sdk used by com.okta.authn.sdk 
    Class and Description
    AuthenticationException
    Base Authentication Exception.
    AuthenticationStateHandler
    Each method of AuthenticationStateHandler corresponds to a state of Okta's Authentication state machine.

  • Classes in com.okta.authn.sdk used by com.okta.authn.sdk.example 
    Class and Description
    AuthenticationStateHandler
    Each method of AuthenticationStateHandler corresponds to a state of Okta's Authentication state machine.
    AuthenticationStateHandlerAdapter
    Adapter implementation of AuthenticationStateHandler that calls AuthenticationStateHandler.handleUnknown(AuthenticationResponse) for each method.
